intro: Master the Machines. Get the Job Done.
description:
Heavy Duty isn’t just about driving. It’s about controlling the toughest machines on Earth and leading a crew through high-stakes missions. Pick your cargo carefully, balance every load, and be ready to drop, crack, break, and try again until the job gets done.

From rocky mountain roads to stormy seas and towering construction sites, each challenge will test your driving skills and your ability to move your team forward. Will you be the one to deliver the cargo, and smash through any obstacle in your way?

Features:
• Master bulldozers, cranes, trucks, ships, and more. Each machine operates differently and gives you new ways to dominate the job.
• Transport heavy loads across dangerous terrain. Mud, water, storms, and heights push your vehicles to the limit.
• Progress through a wide range of levels that grow tougher and more complex as you advance.
• Enjoy cozy yet challenging environments designed for long, satisfying play sessions.

Prepare for action, engage the engines, and prove you’re ready to lead the ultimate heavy-duty crew.
